author: TechHut
description:
Nextcloud Hub 25 is here, and it's time to finally DITCH Google & Microsoft! This landmark "Autumn" update introduces 7 major changes that make self-hosting powerful, private, and unbelievably intuitive. 

Full Release Blog: https://nextcloud.com/blog/nextcloud-hub25-autumn/

See the huge new visual redesign, a productivity-focused AI Assistant that keeps your data private, revolutionary Nextcloud Talk threads with live subtitles, and powerful Calendar polls for stress-free scheduling. Hub 25 is the fastest and most user-friendly private cloud yet!

title: HUGE Updates in Nextcloud Hub 25 - Making it EASY to ditch Google
